dl_earfcn.title: DL EARFCN
dl_earfcn.description: Downlink E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell

mme_list.title: MME list
mme_list.description: Optionnal. List of MME to which the gNodeB is connected

mme_addr.title: MME Address
mme_addr.description: IP address (and optional port) of S1AP SCTP connection to the MME. The default port is 36412.

plmn_list.title: PLMN list
plmn_list.description: List of PLMNs broadcasted by the eNodeB, at most 6 (default: 00101)

attach_without_pdn.title: Attach Without PDN
attach_without_pdn.description: Optional boolean. Indicates if PLMN supports attach without PDN connectivity.

reserved.title: Reserved
reserved.description: True if the cell is reserved for operator use.

inactivity_timer.title: Inactivity Timer
inactivity_timer.description: Send RRC connection release after this time (in ms) of network inactivity.

use_ipv4.title: Use IPv4
use_ipv4.description: Set to true to use IPv4 for AMF / MME addresses

enb_stats_fetch_period.title: eNB statistics fetch period (seconds)
enb_stats_fetch_period.description: Describes how often a call to Amarisoft remote API is made to get eNB statistics

max_rx_sample_db.title: Maximum RX sample value (dB)
max_rx_sample_db.description: Maximum RX sample threshold above which RX saturated promise will fail

promise_cpu_temperature_threshold.title: CPU temperature promise threshold
promise_cpu_temperature_threshold.description: Temperature threshold above which CPU temperature promise will fail

promise_cpu_avg_temperature_threshold.title: Average CPU temperature promise threshold
promise_cpu_avg_temperature_threshold.description: If average temperature over specified duration reaches this threshold, promise will fail

promise_cpu_avg_temperature_threshold_du.title: Average CPU temperature promise threshold duration
promise_cpu_avg_temperature_threshold_du.description: Duration during which average temperature should not exceed specified threshold
